Name: Daniela Bartelli
Title: Vice President, Land Development & Client Relations
Biography:
Daniela Bartelli is Vice President of Land Development & Client Relations for Walsh Company.  Mrs. Bartelli is responsible for overseeing all aspects of land development including due diligence, feasibility, zoning reviews,title and survey review, site and building design, budgeting, lease compliance,entitlements, construction and construction financing. Prior to Walsh Company,Mrs. Bartelli was a Senior Project Management of Development at Avison Young’s New Jersey office.

Mrs. Bartelli has been developing commercial real estate throughout the New Jersey/NY Metro Area for over 15years and has extensive knowledge of the Municipal Land Use Law and the approval process in New Jersey.  She has been a member of ICSC for 15 years and is also a member of NAIOP and The Pipeline Women’s Real Estate Organization.

When she is not working on real estate projects, you can find her working on her golf game and singing at any chance she gets.

Name: Edward S. Walsh, P.E.
Title: President
Biography:
Edward S. Walsh is the President of The Walsh Company. Founded in 2003 by Edward S. Walsh, The Walsh Company soon developed into a successful firm of over fifty highly accomplished professionals headquartered in Morristown, New Jersey.  Before founding The Walsh Company, Mr. Walsh worked as a Senior Vice-President at Gale & Wentworth, a diversified real estate investment and services firm.  

Mr. Walsh is actively involved in helping to raise funds for several nonprofit organizations in Morris and Somerset Counties in New Jersey.  He has been recognized for his philanthropic efforts on behalf of The American Cancer Society, Somerset Hills Learning Institute, Interfaith Food Pantry of Morristown, Employment Horizons, JVS & Family Service of MC.

Name: Hoon Lee, R.A.
Title: Director
Subtitle: Project Management
Biography:
Hoon Lee is responsible for project management activities for corporate base building core & shell projects as well as interior projects. Prior to Walsh Company, Mr. Lee was the Director of Project Management at Avison Young’s New Jersey office where he was responsible for managing project design, bidding, cost control, schedule & construction.   Mr. Lee served as an Executive Manager for Kumkang Housing Development Co., overseeing all development activities including feasibility study, market study, marketing, negotiations and contracts, construction cost control, lender relations, property management and  construction management.

He has completed many corporate & development projects in various roles, as an architect, design builder, construction manager & owner. His understanding of architectural details and over 25 years of experience in various positions allow him to foresee potential areas of risk and resolve them by providing innovative alternate solutions.

Name: John Mercurio
Title: Principal, Executive Vice President Construction
Subtitle: Construction Management
Biography:
John Mercurio is a President of Construction.   Prior to joining Walsh Company, Mr. Mercurio served as Vice President of Construction and Project Management for Avison Young’s New Jersey office where he was responsible for overseeing construction and project management related services including core and shell building renovations, capital improvements, office interiors, and site work improvements.  

Mr. Mercurio has over thirty years of experience in the construction industry. His proven management skills and general knowledge of construction methods and procedures have enabled him to successfully execute projects of increasing responsibility and complexity.   Prior to joining The Walsh Company, John served as Senior Project Manager for The Gale Construction Company for three years and as Project Manager for four years.  John is an honorably discharged US Army Veteran and served from 1979 to 1985.

Name: Lisa M. Kaufman
Title: Project Manager
Biography:
Lisa Kaufman is responsible for developing and maintaining the budget and schedule for the project while monitoring vendor compliance.  Her diligence in providing updates throughout the process keeps the client well informed.

Prior to joining Walsh Company, Ms. Kaufman was employed with Gensler where she had roles as both a designer and project manager.  While at Gensler she managed many high-profile and complex commercial interior projects simultaneously.  Her experience as a designer and project manager at Gensler provides her with the skills to clearly understand the complete  architectural,  design & management process.

Name: Rebecca Sanchez
Title: Project Manager
Biography:
As Construction Project Manager at Walsh Company, Rebecca Sanchez is responsible for taking a variety of office, industrial, educational and retail projects from conceptual budgets through construction close out.

Rebecca has over 12 years of design and construction management experience and holds a BFA in Interior Design.  Prior to Walsh Company, she was the Project Manager at Avison Young’s New Jersey office where she was responsible for managing various construction projects.  Prior to that she was the Manager of Store Design at Kings Food Markets|Balducci’s Holdings, where she redesigned the chain’s 35 regional stores over an aggressive 3 year period.  Rebecca began her career working for Toys R Us’s and held various roles within Property Development.

In her spare time, Rebecca enjoys salsa dancing and is actively involved at her church.  She was recently part of a mission trip to a remote Kashmiri village in the Himalayan Mountains, where she and a team of 5 other church members rebuilt a school roof and spent time at a boarding school for troubled children.
